title: Add front-page showcase for bags by material (cotton canvas, towel, jacquard, raffia, jute, beads/embroidery)

requirements.text: Add a new front-page showcase section (or extend the existing BagGallery section) that clearly highlights Gal Fashion World bags made of the following materials: cotton canvas, cotton towel, jacquard, paper raffia, jute, and beads/embroidery.

quotes: please add bags made of cotton canvas, cotton towel, jacquard, paper raffia, jute and beads / embroidery in front page.

acceptanceCriteria: The front page includes a visible section dedicated to bag materials/craftsmanship.
All six materials are explicitly listed as user-facing text in English: "Cotton Canvas", "Cotton Towel", "Jacquard", "Paper Raffia", "Jute", and "Beads / Embroidery".
The section is reachable in the existing single-page scroll flow (rendered within the main page, not behind a new route).
Layout is responsive (1 column on mobile, multiple columns on larger screens) and visually consistent with the existing site theme.

requirements.text: Add and display one representative image per requested material in the new/updated front-page materials showcase, using static assets stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly from the frontend.

quotes: please add bags made of cotton canvas, cotton towel, jacquard, paper raffia, jute and beads / embroidery in front page.

acceptanceCriteria: There are 6 material cards/tiles, each showing an image plus the material name caption.
All 6 images load successfully in the browser from /assets/generated/... paths (no backend routing).
Each image has appropriate English alt text describing the visual (material + bag type), and the caption text matches the material list.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as-is (no Motoko changes required for this request).
Store any new images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them via direct public paths.
nonGoals: Do not add ecommerce functionality (cart, checkout, payments).
Do not add new authentication requirements.
Do not change the existing Hero video behavior as part of this request.
